workshoptitle: Cloud-native analytics using Open-source tools with MySQL HeatWave

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Building cloud native solution using popular open-source data engineering tools such as Superset, Grafana and Zeppelin with MySQL HeatWave

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Oracle Kubernetes Engine and MySQL HeatWave
tutorials.description: Create Oracle Kubernetes Engine and MySQL HeatWave using OCI Resource Manager

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Load data into MySQL HeatWave
tutorials.description: Use mysql shell to load airportdb data set to MySQL HeatWave cluster

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Deploy ingress-controller
tutorials.description: Deploy ingress controller to OCI Kubernetes

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Deploy Grafana dashboard
tutorials.description: Deploy Grafana Dashboard for MySQL to OCI Kubernetes

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Deploy Superset dashboard
tutorials.description: Build analytics dashboard with Superset on MySQL HeatWave

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Deploy Redash dashboard
tutorials.description: Create dashborad with Redash on MySQL HeatWave

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Deploy Jupyter notebook
tutorials.description: Analyze data with Jupyter on MySQL HeatWave

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Deploy Zeppelin notebook
tutorials.description: Build interactive analytics notebook with Zeppelin on MySQL HeatWave

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
